structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

law.text: All information obtained by the commissioner in connection with any inspection or proceeding under this chapter which might reveal a trade secret shall be considered confidential except that such information may be disclosed to those persons concerned with carrying out this chapter or when relevant in any proceedings under this chapter. In any such proceedings, the commissioner, review commission or courts shall issue such orders as may be appropriate to protect the confidentiality of trade secrets.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1764, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 18.
